title: Episode 199: It’s Hard To Human with Susan David
itunes:title: Episode 199: It’s Hard To Human with Susan David
description:
Kate tests a Vintner’s Daughter dupe and Doree sets an intention to set 2022 intentions. Then, Susan David, an award-winning Harvard Medical School psychologist, joins the podcast to chat about her book Emotional Agility, how journaling has remained a lifelong self-care practice, what the narrative of reliability stems from and how to change it, and why a gratitude journal can breed toxic positivity.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
